name: Maximum Computer Systems
overview: Maximum Computer Systems, Inc. a New York based leading systems integration provider focuses on developing effective business software solutions for the wholesale distribution industry. They have been in business for over 23 years offering expertise in implementing our customerâ€™s business needs. As an IBM Business Partner, they represent IBMâ€™s unique family of Power Systems and xSeries hardware, along with the Websphere software product that provides an affordable entry point to e-commerce business whether B2B (business to business); or B2C (business to consumer). As a Premier Infor Distribution Essentials Partner, MCS has provided enterprise resource planning software solutions for hundreds of customers. The Infor ERP A + solution is a robust distribution management solution for this industry. They have a team of professionals that can personalize your system according to your business requirements. They also provide lease and finance options, so tey can make our solution a lucrative investment.

acquisitions.source_description: MCS Acquires Barsa Distribution Systems, Inc.
